title: tiramisu cakes
description: The nobility of posh dinner-party puds, but with the playfulness of a cupcake. Impress your friends with Lorraine Pascale's dainty dessert.Equipment and preparation: You will need a 12-hole muffin tin.
ingredients: 3 tbsp coffee essence or 2 tbsp coffee dissolved in 4 tbsp water
icing sugar and cocoa powder, for dusting
1 vanilla pod, seeds only (or 2 drops vanilla extract)
2 tbsp coffee essence or 2 tbsp coffee powder
